topics.body:
"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d39796368720e150005b6#post_559d39796368720e150005b6
How do I disable Flash than?

Also wouldn't This mean I couldn't watch any videos? 

Also how do I check what version of Flash I have?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d426a636872175d000942#post_559d426a636872175d000942
Well which browser do you use and is it updated to the latest version?

If it's Firefox, you open up your menu, click add-ons, then from there click plug ins, then look for Flash. It should have the version number next to it. If its not version 18.0.0.203 head to adobes website and install the latest vesion.

Also, did a quick check and Youtube uses HTML 5 as its default now.
topics.author: 4fde01d7945b70057c00024d

topics.body:

topics.body:
"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d469b636872175d000e65#post_559d469b636872175d000e65
Oh god I have 18,0,0,194 on here. 

What do I do? Update it or just uninstall it?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d472e63687242cc000c79#post_559d472e63687242cc000c79
Update, on that link click menu, then when the menu comes up click Adobe Flash Player then when that page loads, check the version number, if its 18.0.0.203, hit the install now icon then take it from there.
topics.author: 4fde01d7945b70057c00024d

topics.body:
"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d47fe6368727aa80032c5#post_559d47fe6368727aa80032c5
Alright! Got 18.0.0.203 installed! Thanks a lot man!

Now since the crisis is over (For now anyway) How, How did they let this happen?

Also I hope they are able to fix this soon. Cuz this sucks, a lot of people use flash, its an important program.

And the fact that an important program is possibly going to lead to Viruses is terrible.

This needs to show them that they really need to up their security. Something like this shouldn't happen again.

topics.body:
+Status Update:+ _EHAN and I are having trouble Amending Fences ramble/review is being delayed yet again. We originally said it was going to come out sometime today, but that's probably not going to happen._

*It may come out on 7/9 or 7/10 at the latest. Hopefully no later than that.*

*My throat's been kinda dry since late Monday, but it's healing fast, and I don't want to strain my throat too soon and come down because of it.*

_Say what you may about reviewing stuff (especially ponies), but it isn't as easy as you think.
Especially when you're a noob at it, and you want to start rising above noob status._

_That's all. Now have a pretty train to look at:_

!http://cazphoto.co.uk/photoblog/files/2013/06/D1011-123.jpg!
